comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I wouldn’t be risking buying any kind of hardware wallet(s) from an unofficial source. It’s cool to buy stuff with bitcoin on black Friday. I remember people getting really excited many years ago on black Friday deals but just be careful out there.
